scripts.dev: cross-env DOMAIN=http://localhost MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/oow ENVIRONMENT=devolopment MAIL_HOST=smtp.mailtrap.io MAIL_PORT=465 MAIL_USER=c34bfb6d113c0d MAIL_PASS=bc13da42f80623 nodemon app.js
scripts.debug: cross-env DOMAIN=http://localhost MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/oow ENVIRONMENT=devolopment MAIL_HOST=smtp.mailtrap.io MAIL_PORT=465 MAIL_USER=c34bfb6d113c0d MAIL_PASS=bc13da42f80623 node --inspect app.js
scripts.deploy: now -e DOMAIN=@domain MONGO_URL=@mongo-url ENVIRONMENT=@environment MAIL_HOST=@mail-host MAIL_PORT=@mail-port MAIL_USER=@mail-user MAIL_PASS=@mail-pass
